subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ahead of Game 1 on Friday, Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma said he might use his star centers on the same line, as he did last series, and would try to exploit the Rangers’ lack of rest.
snippet: Ahead of Game 1 on Friday, Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma said he might use his star centers on the same line, as he did last series, and would try to exploit the Rangers’ lack of rest.
